Text: Richard Crenna did not head up the A-team (George Peppard did) - he was John Rambo's commander Col. Samuel Trautman.

Gavin McLeod was already "sort of" famous for his recurring role on TV's "McHale's Navy".

Richard Crenna was very famous from radio days on "Our Miss Brooks" and TV's "The Real McCoys" with Walter Brennan.

Richard Attenborough was very much a highly respected actor from Britain before ever making "The Sand Pebbles".  He had already made many films since 1942; including "The Great Escape" and "The Flight of The Phoenix".

Candice Bergen's second film role at age of 19.  She is the daughter of the famous Edgar Bergen, a ventriloquist of the 20's, 30's, and thru the 50's.  His characters were Charlie McCarthy, Mortimer Snerd and others.
